resources.string: How to play:\nRemember and identify pairs of identical cards
Slide picture to the left or right for switching game mode.

You have 5 seconds to remember the cards, identify pairs of identical cards as you can! No limitation here! 
Level: 
Low: 6 pairs of cards 
Medium: 8 pairs of cards 
High: 10 pairs of cards

You have 5 seconds to remember the cards, identify pairs of identical cards as you can! 8 pairs of cards here! 
Level: 
Low: No limitation 
Medium: Moves only in 15 steps 
High: Moves only in 13 steps

You have 5 seconds to remember the cards, identify pairs of identical cards as you can! Complete 8 pairs of cards within 30 seconds! 
Successfully: Extra 10 seconds bonus and continue the game 

P.s. Seconds are cumulative
